title: Джентльмен сыска Иван Подушкин
overview: Meet Ivan Podushkin, the last Moscow gentleman and personal secretary of an old millionaire woman. It all started when Ivan saw how his boss's granddaughter was knocked over by a car. Members of "Unreal Stories" TV show also witnessed this accident. Ivan is not obsessed with all those detective stories as common Dontsova's characters. He is a respectable bachelor, tolkienist and the poet, who is not into chasing after bandits. But his boss, Eleanor, is a fan of detective stories. She wants Ivan to be determined and to become the eyes and feet of the great detective!
